summary: Enables you to craft scrolls at the tanning racks.
descriptionHtml:
Enable you to craft scrolls from the following materials:

1. paper and charcoal
    needed for all scrolls.
2. salts:
    needed for restoration and armor scrolls. 
3. gems:
    needed for expensive scrolls.

The recipe is in the game. 

Installing : put the esp file into your Data folder. make sure to select it at \"Data FIles\" from the launcher screen.
Uninstalling : delete the esp file.

Enjoy !
author: Hypercross
